sourcesContent:
<template ref="chatSpace">
  <!--  <IonList>-->
  <!--    <IonList v-for="message in messages" v-bind:key="message">-->
  <!--      <IonItem id="open-modal" expand="block">-->
  <!--        wow-->
  <!--      </IonItem>-->
  <!--    </IonList>-->
  <!--  </IonList>-->
  <IonList v-for="item in content.chat" v-bind:key="item">
    <IonItem>{{ item }}</IonItem>
  </IonList>

  <IonModal ref="modal" trigger="open-modal" @willDismiss="onWillDismiss">
    <IonHeader>
      <IonToolbar>
        <IonButtons slot="start">
          <IonButton @click="cancel()">Cancel</IonButton>
        </IonButtons>
        <IonTitle>{{ messages }}</IonTitle>
        <IonButtons slot="end">
          <IonButton :strong="true" @click="confirm()">Confirm</IonButton>
        </IonButtons>
      </IonToolbar>
    </IonHeader>
    <IonItem>
      <IonLabel position="stacked">Enter your name</IonLabel>
      <IonInput ref="input" type="text" placeholder="Your name"></IonInput>
    </IonItem>
  </IonModal>
</template>

<script>
/* eslint-disable vue/no-unused-components */
import {
  IonCard,
  IonCardHeader,
  IonCardSubtitle,
  IonCardTitle,
  IonIcon,
  IonCardContent,
  IonList,
  IonItem,
  modalController,
  IonModal,
  IonHeader,
  IonToolbar,
  IonButtons,
  IonButton,
  IonSearchbar,
  IonTitle,
  IonContent,
  IonInput,
  IonLabel,
} from '@ionic/vue';
import ChatItem from "@/components/ChatItem.vue";
import {defineComponent, reactive, ref} from 'vue';
import { useMatrixClient } from "@/stores/MatrixClient";

let client = useMatrixClient();

let content = ref({})

export default {
  name: "ChatSpace",
  data() {
    return {
      content,
    }
  },
  setup() {
    return {}
  },
  components: {
    ChatItem,
    IonCard,
    IonCardHeader,
    IonCardSubtitle,
    IonCardTitle,
    IonIcon,
    IonCardContent,
    IonList,
    IonItem,
    modalController,
    IonModal,
    IonHeader,
    IonToolbar,
    IonButtons,
    IonButton,
    IonSearchbar,
    IonTitle,
    IonContent,
    IonInput,
    IonLabel,
  },
  props: {
    groupId: String,
  },
  methods: {
    cancel() {
      this.$refs.modal.$el.dismiss(null, 'cancel');
    },
    confirm() {
      const name = this.$refs.input.$el.value;
      this.$refs.modal.$el.dismiss(name, 'confirm');
    },
    onWillDismiss(ev) {
      if (ev.detail.role === 'confirm') {
        this.message = `Hello, ${ev.detail.data}!`;
      }
    },
    async fetchData() {
      const id = "!" + this.$route.params.id + ":matrix.org";
      setInterval(async () => {
        try {
          content = await client.getGroupContent(this.groupId)
        } catch {
          return
        }
        console.log(content.value)
      }, 1000);
    },
  },
  created() {
    this.$watch(
        () => this.$route.params,
        () => {
          this.fetchData()
        },
        // fetch the data when the view is created and the data is
        // already being observed
        {immediate: true}
    )
  },
}

</script>

<style scoped>
</style>
